Name: InterTVA. A multimodal MRI dataset for the study of inter-individual differences in voice perception and identification.
Acknowledgements: The data was acquired at the Centre IRM-INT, Marseille, France. http://irmf.int.univ-amu.fr/
HowToAcknowledge: Please cite as follows. Aglieri, V., Cagna, B., Belin, P., Takerkart, S. InterTVA. A multimodal MRI dataset for the study of inter-individual differences in voice perception and identification. OpenNeuro, 2019, http://www.doi.org/10.18112/openneuro.ds001771.v1.0.2
Funding: This dataset was acquired as part of the LIVES  project funded by the French Agence Nationale de la Recherche (ANR-15-CE23-0026)
